title: Kyrie
description:
Swagu and Perk discuss Kyrie Irving's impact on the Nets and how him not playing most of the season changes the way we look at this team, also Kendrick Perkins responds to Anthony Edwards, as they assess whether they believe his T-Wolves can beat the Grizzlies, and they address Keyshawn and J-Will saying they would beat them in a 2v2. All that and more!
